verses.verse: Now Korah <S%H7141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Izhar, <S%H3324><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> with Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram, <S%H48><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab, <S%H446><s%> and On <S%H203><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Peleth, <S%H6431><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> [action,]

and they rose <S%H6965><s%> up before <S%H6440><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> together with some <S%H376><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> leaders <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> chosen <S%H7148><s%> in the assembly, <S%H4150><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of renown. <S%H8034><s%>

And they assembled <S%H6950><s%> together against <S%H5921><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, "You have gone far <S%H7227><s%> enough, <S%H7227><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> are holy, <S%H6918><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one <S%H3605><s%> of them, and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is in their midst; <S%H8432><s%> so why <S%H4069><s%> do you exalt <S%H5375><s%> yourselves above <S%H5921><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>?"
When Moses <S%H4872><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> [this,] he fell <S%H5307><s%> on his face; <S%H6440><s%>

and he spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Korah <S%H7141><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his company, <S%H5712><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Tomorrow <S%H1242><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will show <S%H3045><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is His, and who is holy, <S%H6918><s%> and will bring <S%H7126><s%> [him] near <S%H7126><s%> to Himself; even the one whom <S%H834><s%> He will choose, <S%H977><s%> He will bring <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to Himself.
"Do <S%H6213><s%> this: <S%H2088><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> censers <S%H4289><s%> for yourselves, Korah <S%H7141><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> your company, <S%H5712><s%>

and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in them, and lay <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> upon them in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> tomorrow; <S%H4279><s%> and the man <S%H376><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> chooses <S%H977><s%> [shall be] the one <S%H6918><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> is holy. <S%H6918><s%> You have gone far <S%H7227><s%> enough, <S%H7227><s%> you sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi! <S%H3878><s%> "
Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Korah, <S%H7141><s%> "Hear <S%H8085><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> you sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%>

is it not enough <S%H4592><s%> for you that the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> has separated <S%H914><s%> you from the [rest of] the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to bring <S%H7126><s%> you near <S%H7126><s%> to Himself, to do <S%H5647><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> to them;

and that He has brought <S%H7126><s%> you near, <S%H7126><s%> [Korah,] and all <S%H3605><s%> your brothers, <S%H251><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> with you? And are you seeking <S%H1245><s%> for the priesthood <S%H3550><s%> also <S%H1571><s%>?

"Therefore <S%H3651><s%> you and all <S%H3605><s%> your company <S%H5712><s%> are gathered <S%H3259><s%> together against <S%H5921><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> but as for Aaron, <S%H175><s%> who <S%H4100><s%> is he that you grumble <S%H9235><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him?"

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> a summons <S%H7121><s%> to Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram, <S%H48><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab; <S%H446><s%> but they said, <S%H559><s%> "We will not come <S%H5927><s%> up.

"Is it not enough <S%H4592><s%> that you have brought <S%H5927><s%> us up out of a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%> to have us die <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> but you would also <S%H1571><s%> lord <S%H8323><s%> it over <S%H5921><s%> us?

"Indeed, <S%H637><s%> you have not brought <S%H935><s%> us into a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> have you given <S%H5414><s%> us an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of fields <S%H7704><s%> and vineyards. <S%H3754><s%> Would you put <S%H5365><s%> out the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of these <S%H1992><s%> men <S%H376><s%>? We will not come <S%H5927><s%> up!"

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> became <S%H2734><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> angry <S%H2734><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Do not regard <S%H6437><s%> their offering! <S%H4503><s%> I have not taken <S%H5375><s%> a single <S%H259><s%> donkey <S%H2543><s%> from them, nor <S%H3808><s%> have I done <S%H7489><s%> harm <S%H7489><s%> to any <S%H259><s%> of them."

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Korah, <S%H7141><s%> "You and all <S%H3605><s%> your company <S%H5712><s%> be present <S%H1961><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> tomorrow, <S%H4279><s%> both you and they along with Aaron. <S%H175><s%>

"And each <S%H376><s%> of you take <S%H3947><s%> his firepan <S%H4289><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> on it, and each <S%H376><s%> of you bring <S%H7126><s%> his censer <S%H4289><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> firepans; <S%H4289><s%> also you and Aaron <S%H175><s%> [shall] each <S%H376><s%> [bring] his firepan. <S%H4289><s%>"

So they each <S%H376><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> his [own] censer <S%H4289><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> on it, and laid <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> on it; and they stood <S%H5975><s%> at the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> with Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron. <S%H175><s%>

Thus Korah <S%H7141><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them at the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting. <S%H4150><s%> And the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation. <S%H5712><s%>
Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Separate <S%H914><s%> yourselves from among <S%H8432><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> congregation, <S%H5712><s%> that I may consume <S%H3615><s%> them instantly. <S%H7281><s%>"

But they fell <S%H5307><s%> on their faces, <S%H6440><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "O God, <S%H410><s%> Thou God <S%H430><s%> of the spirits <S%H7307><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> when one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> sins, <S%H2398><s%> wilt Thou be angry <S%H7107><s%> with the entire <S%H3605><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%>?"
Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Get <S%H5927><s%> back <S%H5927><s%> from around <S%H5439><s%> the dwellings <S%H4908><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram. <S%H48><s%>'"

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> to Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram, <S%H48><s%> with the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> following <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> him,

and he spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Depart <S%H5493><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> from the tents <S%H168><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> wicked <S%H7563><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> and touch <S%H5060><s%> nothing <S%H408><s%> <S%H3605><s%> that belongs to them, lest <S%H6435><s%> you be swept <S%H5595><s%> away <S%H5595><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> their sin. <S%H9128><s%>"

So they got <S%H5927><s%> back <S%H5927><s%> from around <S%H5439><s%> the dwellings <S%H4908><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram; <S%H48><s%> and Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out [and] stood <S%H5324><s%> at the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of their tents, <S%H168><s%> along with their wives <S%H802><s%> and their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their little <S%H2945><s%> ones. <S%H2945><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "By this <S%H2088><s%> you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> deeds; <S%H4639><s%> for this is not my doing. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3820><s%>

"If <S%H518><s%> these <S%H428><s%> men <S%H428><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> men, <S%H120><s%> or if they suffer <S%H6485><s%> the fate <S%H6486><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> men, <S%H120><s%> [then] the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has not sent <S%H7971><s%> me.

"But if <S%H518><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brings <S%H1254><s%> about <S%H1254><s%> an entirely <S%H1278><s%> new <S%H1278><s%> thing <S%H1278><s%> and the ground <S%H127><s%> opens <S%H6475><s%> its mouth <S%H6310><s%> and swallows <S%H1104><s%> them up with all <S%H3605><s%> that is theirs, <S%H1992><s%> and they descend <S%H3381><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%> into Sheol, <S%H7585><s%> then you will understand <S%H3045><s%> that these <S%H428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> have spurned <S%H5006><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

Then it came <S%H1961><s%> about as he finished <S%H3615><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> that the ground <S%H127><s%> that was under <S%H8478><s%> them split <S%H1234><s%> open; <S%H1234><s%>

and the earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> its mouth <S%H6310><s%> and swallowed <S%H1104><s%> them up, and their households, <S%H1004><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H120><s%> who <S%H834><s%> belonged to Korah, <S%H7141><s%> with [their] possessions. <S%H7399><s%>

So they and all <S%H3605><s%> that belonged to them went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%> to Sheol; <S%H7585><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> closed <S%H3680><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them, and they perished from the midst <S%H6><s%> of the assembly. <S%H8432><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] around <S%H5439><s%> them fled <S%H5127><s%> at their outcry, <S%H6963><s%> for they said, <S%H559><s%> "The earth <S%H776><s%> may swallow <S%H1104><s%> us up!"

Fire <S%H784><s%> also came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> from the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and consumed <S%H398><s%> the two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> men <S%H376><s%> who were offering <S%H7126><s%> the incense. <S%H7004><s%>
Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Say <S%H559><s%> to Eleazar, <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> that he shall take <S%H7311><s%> up the censers <S%H4289><s%> out of the midst <S%H996><s%> of the blaze, <S%H8316><s%> for they are holy; <S%H6942><s%> and you scatter <S%H2219><s%> the burning <S%H784><s%> coals <S%H784><s%> abroad. <S%H1973><s%>

"As for the censers <S%H4289><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> men <S%H2400><s%> <S%H5315><s%> who <S%H2400><s%> have sinned <S%H2400><s%> at the cost of their lives, <S%H5315><s%> let them be made <S%H6213><s%> into hammered <S%H7555><s%> sheets <S%H9449><s%> for a plating <S%H6826><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> since <S%H3588><s%> they did present <S%H7126><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and they are holy; <S%H6942><s%> and they shall be for a sign <S%H226><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"

So Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the bronze <S%H5178><s%> censers <S%H4289><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the men who were burned <S%H8313><s%> had offered; <S%H7126><s%> and they hammered <S%H7554><s%> them out as a plating <S%H6826><s%> for the altar, <S%H4196><s%>

as a reminder <S%H2146><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that no <S%H3808><s%> layman <S%H2114><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is not of the descendants <S%H2233><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> should come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to burn <S%H6999><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> that he might not become <S%H1961><s%> like Korah <S%H7141><s%> and his company <S%H5712><s%> – just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to him through <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

But on the next <S%H4283><s%> day <S%H4283><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> grumbled <S%H9235><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "You are the ones who have caused <S%H4191><s%> the death <S%H4191><s%> of the Lord's people. <S%H5971><s%>"

It came <S%H1961><s%> about, however, when the congregation <S%H5712><s%> had assembled <S%H6950><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> that they turned <S%H6437><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> it and the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared. <S%H7200><s%>
Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to the front <S%H6440><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%>
and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Get <S%H7426><s%> away <S%H7426><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> congregation, <S%H5712><s%> that I may consume <S%H3615><s%> them instantly. <S%H7281><s%>" Then they fell <S%H5307><s%> on their faces. <S%H6440><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "Take <S%H3947><s%> your censer <S%H4289><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> in it fire <S%H784><s%> from the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and lay <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> [on it;] then bring <S%H1980><s%> it quickly <S%H4120><s%> to the congregation <S%H5712><s%> and make <S%H3722><s%> atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them, for wrath <S%H7110><s%> has gone <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> from the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the plague <S%H5063><s%> has begun! <S%H2490><s%>"

Then Aaron <S%H175><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> [it] as Moses <S%H4872><s%> had spoken, <S%H1696><s%> and ran <S%H7323><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the assembly, <S%H6951><s%> for behold, <S%H2009><s%> the plague <S%H5063><s%> had begun <S%H2490><s%> among the people. <S%H5971><s%> So he put <S%H5414><s%> [on] the incense <S%H7004><s%> and made <S%H3722><s%> atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the people. <S%H5971><s%>
And he took <S%H5975><s%> his stand <S%H5975><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the dead <S%H4191><s%> and the living, <S%H2416><s%> so that the plague <S%H4046><s%> was checked. <S%H6113><s%>
But those who died <S%H4191><s%> by the plague <S%H4046><s%> were 14700, besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> those who died <S%H4191><s%> on account <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> of Korah. <S%H7141><s%>

Then Aaron <S%H175><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> at the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> for the plague <S%H4046><s%> had been checked. <S%H6113><s%>
